'''Sir Peter Robert Jackson''' ([[31 October|October 31]], [[1961]]) is a [[New Zealand]]-born Academy Award-winning director, screenwriter and producer.He is one of the co-creators of [[Wētā FX]], formerly known as ''Weta Digital''. He directed, co-wrote and produced [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' trilogy]] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' trilogy]].
